casebody.data:
STITT v. POLICE BOARD. MURRAY v. POLICE BOARD. WALLER v. POLICE BOARD. Appeal from Multnomah County.

Decided 6 January;

rehearing denied 10 May, 1902.

These cases, brought by W. O. Stitt, Patrick Murray, and Mose "Waller, respectively, are companion cases to Venable v. Police Commissioners, 40 Or. 458 (67 Pac. 203), and were decided on the authority of that case, briefs and arguments being waived.

Reversed.
